product_name: Cycle Dog Flat Tire Flyer Dog Toy
long_description: This is one mountain bike tire you can encourage your dog to chase after. Made from Ecolast recycled material, the earth-friendly Cycle Dog Flat Tire Flyer floats as well as flies. Flying disc dog toy is made from post-consumer recycled plastic. Soft on doggie teeth and gums. Highly durable; 8 in. diameter.
short_description: This is one mountain bike tire you can encourage your dog to chase after. Made from Ecolast recycled material, the earth-friendly Cycle Dog Flat Tire Flyer floats as well as flies.
